Body: Possible Duplicate:  How can I disable shortcuts from being created after install from Google Play?  Every time I install an app a shortcut gets created on my home-screen, I don't want this to happen so I am wondering if there is a way to prevent the creation of shortcuts unless I want them created.
Title: Is there anyway I can disable the posting of app shortcuts on my home-screen when an app is installed?
